languages.text: Ключевой причиной поражения был необычайно высокий процент капитанов, предавших клятвы и переметнувшихся на сторону Вольного Торговца. В одночасье он{mf||а} обрел{mf||а} собственный боевой флот.

The crucial reason for the defeat was the extraordinarily high percentage of captains who betrayed their oaths and defected to the Rogue Trader's side. Overnight, {mf|he|she} acquired a battle-ready fleet of {mf|his|her} own.
languages.original_text: Ключевой причиной поражения был необычайно высокий процент капитанов, предавших клятвы и переметнувшихся на сторону Вольного Торговца. В одночасье он{mf||а} обрел{mf||а} собственный боевой флот.

traits.locale_text: The crucial reason for the defeat was an extraordinarily high percentage of captains who betrayed their oaths and defected to the Rogue Trader's side. Overnight, \{mf|he|she} acquired a battle-ready fleet of \{mf|his|her} own.

The crucial reason for the defeat was an extraordinarily high percentage of captains who betrayed their oaths and defected to the Rogue Trader's side. Overnight, \{mf|he|she} acquired a battle-ready fleet of \{mf|his|her} own.

The crucial reason for the defeat was the extraordinarily high percentage of captains who betrayed their oaths and defected to the Rogue Trader's side. Overnight, {mf|he|she} acquired a battle-ready fleet of {mf|his|her} own.

The crucial reason for the defeat was the extraordinarily high percentage of captains who betrayed their oaths and defected to the Rogue Trader's side. Overnight, {mf|he|she} acquired a battle-ready fleet of {mf|his|her} own.

The crucial reason for the defeat was the extraordinarily high percentage of captains who betrayed their oaths and defected to the Rogue Trader's side. Overnight, {mf|he|she} acquired a battle-ready fleet of {mf|his|her} own.

languages.text: 这场失败的关键原因是相当一大部分舰长违背了自己的誓言，投靠了行商浪人一方。一夜之间，行商浪人就得到了一支属于{mf|他|她}自己的舰队。
languages.original_text: The crucial reason for the defeat was the extraordinarily high percentage of captains who betrayed their oaths and defected to the Rogue Trader's side. Overnight, {mf|he|she} acquired a battle-ready fleet of {mf|his|her} own.

traits.locale_text: 这场失败的关键原因是相当一大部分舰长违背了自己的誓言，投靠了行商浪人一方。一夜之间，行商浪人就得到了一支属于{mf|他|她}自己的舰队。

languages.text: 大敗の決定的な理由は、桁外れに多くの中隊長が誓いを破って自由開拓者へ寝返ったことだ。一夜にして、{mf|彼|彼女}は戦闘態勢が整った艦隊を手に入れた。
languages.original_text: The crucial reason for the defeat was the extraordinarily high percentage of captains who betrayed their oaths and defected to the Rogue Trader's side. Overnight, {mf|he|she} acquired a battle-ready fleet of {mf|his|her} own.

traits.locale_text: 大敗の決定的な理由は、桁外れに多くの中隊長が誓いを破って自由開拓者へ寝返ったことだ。一夜にして、{mf|彼|彼女}は戦闘態勢が整った艦隊を手に入れた。

languages.text: La principale raison de la défaite fut le pourcentage incroyablement élevé de capitaines qui trahirent leurs serments pour passer dans le camp {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Du jour au lendemain, {mf|ce dernier|cette dernière} se retrouva avec une flotte parée au combat.
languages.original_text: The crucial reason for the defeat was the extraordinarily high percentage of captains who betrayed their oaths and defected to the Rogue Trader's side. Overnight, {mf|he|she} acquired a battle-ready fleet of {mf|his|her} own.

traits.locale_text: La principale raison de la défaite fut le pourcentage incroyablement élevé de capitaines qui trahirent leurs serments pour passer dans le camp {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Du jour au lendemain, {mf|ce dernier|cette dernière} se retrouva avec une flotte parée au combat.

languages.text: El motivo principal de la derrota fue el porcentaje increíblemente elevado de capitanes que renunciaron a sus juramentos y se pasaron al bando de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. De la noche a la mañana, se hizo con una flota de guerra al completo.
languages.original_text: The crucial reason for the defeat was the extraordinarily high percentage of captains who betrayed their oaths and defected to the Rogue Trader's side. Overnight, {mf|he|she} acquired a battle-ready fleet of {mf|his|her} own.

traits.locale_text: El motivo principal de la derrota fue el porcentaje increíblemente elevado de capitanes que renunciaron a sus juramentos y se pasaron al bando de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. De la noche a la mañana, se hizo con una flota de guerra al completo.

languages.text: Der Hauptgrund der Niederlage war der ungewöhnlich hohe Prozentsatz an Captains, die ihre Pfade verrieten und {mf|zum Freihändler|zur Freihändlerin} überliefen. Praktisch über Nacht stand {mf|ihm|ihr} eine eigene kampfbereite Flotte zur Verfügung.
languages.original_text: The crucial reason for the defeat was the extraordinarily high percentage of captains who betrayed their oaths and defected to the Rogue Trader's side. Overnight, {mf|he|she} acquired a battle-ready fleet of {mf|his|her} own.

traits.locale_text: Der Hauptgrund der Niederlage war der ungewöhnlich hohe Prozentsatz an Captains, die ihre Pfade verrieten und {mf|zum Freihändler|zur Freihändlerin} überliefen. Praktisch über Nacht stand {mf|ihm|ihr} eine eigene kampfbereite Flotte zur Verfügung.

languages.text: Mağlubiyetin ana sebebi, yeminlerinden dönen ve Hür Tacir'in tarafına geçen kaptanların sayısının aşırı derecede yüksek olmasıydı. Hür Tacir, bir gecede savaşa hazır bir filoya sahip olmuştu.
languages.original_text: The crucial reason for the defeat was the extraordinarily high percentage of captains who betrayed their oaths and defected to the Rogue Trader's side. Overnight, {mf|he|she} acquired a battle-ready fleet of {mf|his|her} own.

traits.locale_text: Mağlubiyetin ana sebebi, yeminlerinden dönen ve Hür Tacir'in tarafına geçen kaptanların oranının aşırı derecede yüksek olmasıydı. Bir gecede savaşa hazır bir filoya sahip olmuştu.
